text: Greek food is the cuisine of Greece. Greek food is Mediterranean. ==Gallery== Souvlaki in Athens.JPG|Souvlaki in Athens, known there also as kalamaki (meaning "small reed"). Greek Salad Choriatiki.jpg|Greek salad. Pita giros.JPG|Gyros (meat, onions, tomato, lettuce, fries, and tzatziki rolled in a pita). Kalamataolives.jpg|Olives from Kalamata. File:Παξιμάδια 2.jpg|A plate of paximathia.
title: Greek food
